title: Nadine Dorries – 2022 Comments on Prime Minister not Going to COP
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nadine Dorries, the Conservative MP for Mid Bedfordshire, on Twitter on 28 October 2022.
content:
For [balance, my friend](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/jacob-rees-mogg-2022-comments-on-prime-minister-not-going-to-cop/)…The Prime Minister is WRONG not to go to COP. Global warming is the biggest crisis facing our planet and net zero creates many 1000s of jobs which is good for the economy. COP in Glasgow was most successful ever… but don’t expect media to report that.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
